text: Bageshwar is a district of Uttarakhand state in northern India. The town of Bageshwar is the district headquarters. Prior to its establishment as a district in 1997 it was part of Almora district. As of 2011 it is the third least populous district of Uttarakhand (out of 13), after Rudraprayag and Champawat. == References == Category:Districts of Uttarakhand
title: Bageshwar district
